items.sentence: Tom has been living in Boston since he was three.
Tom has finally finished doing what we requested.
Do you have any idea what time Tom will get here?
Tom has been watching TV in his room all evening.
Tom told me that he enjoys hanging out with Mary.
Tom told me that he was planning to quit his job.
Tom noticed that Mary was wearing a wedding ring.
I wonder how many people will be at Tom\'s party.
I wonder if Tom knows what we\'re supposed to do.
Tom used to play tennis, but he doesn\'t anymore.
